info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 7:34PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with Heavy Rain near Spanish Springs, Nixon, Fernley, Trinity Junction, Fallon, and Lovelock until 815 PM PDT... At 730 PM PDT, meteorologists continue to track showers and thunderstorms with heavy rainfall across portions of Western Nevada. These cells will affect areas mainly east of NV 445 and north of US 50. Storm motions are north at 20 to 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall with rates up to 1 inch per hour, gusty winds to 30 mph, and lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding of low spots and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lovelock, Pyramid Lake, Lahontan Reservoir, Sparks, Fernley, Wingfield Springs, Spanish Springs, Virginia Peak, Oreana, Silver Springs, Derby Dam, Trinity Junction, Lockwood, Sutcliffe, Hazen, Stillwater, Unionville, Nixon, and Gerlach-Empire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Remember to slow down and turn on your headlights in heavy rain.
